title: Bloomberg Markets: Zafran on Microchips Correlation to Markets
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zafran on Microchips Correlation to Markets
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Alan Zafran\u0010Managing Director\u0010First Republic Investment Management\u0010Discussing the markets and how technology, globalization and climate change are all accelerating simultaneously at speeds that humans and societal structures have tremendous difficulty in processing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
